Package org.neo4j.index.internal.gbptree

Class PageCursorUtil

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.neo4j.index.internal.gbptree.PageCursorUtil
  • class PageCursorUtil
extends Object
    PageCursor functionality commonly used around the GBPTree and supporting code.

    • Method Detail

      • put6BLong

        static void put6BLong​(PageCursor cursor,
                      long value)
        Puts the low 6 bytes of the value into cursor at current offset. Puts int followed by short.
        Parameters:
        cursor - PageCursor to put into, at the current offset.
        value - the value to put.

      • get6BLong

        static long get6BLong​(PageCursor cursor)
        Gets 6 bytes from cursor at current offset and returns that a as a long. Reads PageCursor.getInt() followed by PageCursor.getShort().
        Parameters:
        cursor - PageCursor to get from, at the current offset.
        Returns:
        the 6 bytes as a long.

      • putUnsignedShort

        static void putUnsignedShort​(PageCursor cursor,
                             int value)
        Puts the low 2 bytes of the value into cursor at current offset. Puts PageCursor.putShort(short).
        Parameters:
        cursor - PageCursor to put into, at the current offset.
        value - the value to put.

      • putUnsignedShort

        static void putUnsignedShort​(PageCursor cursor,
                             int offset,
                             int value)
        Puts the low 2 bytes of the value into cursor at given offset. Puts PageCursor.putShort(short).
        Parameters:
        cursor - PageCursor to put into.
        offset - offset into page where to write.
        value - the value to put.

      • getUnsignedShort

        static int getUnsignedShort​(PageCursor cursor)
        Gets 2 bytes and returns that value as an int, ignoring its sign.
        Parameters:
        cursor - PageCursor to get from, at the current offset.
        Returns:
        int containing the value of the unsigned short.

      • getUnsignedShort

        static int getUnsignedShort​(PageCursor cursor,
                            int offset)
        Gets 2 bytes and returns that value as an int, ignoring its sign.
        Parameters:
        cursor - PageCursor to get from.
        offset - offset into page from where to read.
        Returns:
        int containing the value of the unsigned short.

      • getUnsignedInt

        static long getUnsignedInt​(PageCursor cursor)
        Gets 4 bytes and returns that value as an long, ignoring its sign.
        Parameters:
        cursor - PageCursor to get from, at the current offset.
        Returns:
        long containing the value of the unsigned int.

      • getUnsignedByte

        static int getUnsignedByte​(PageCursor cursor,
                           int offset)
        Gets 1 byte and returns that value as an int, ignoring its sign.
        Parameters:
        cursor - PageCursor to get from, at the current offset.
        offset - offset into page from where to read.
        Returns:
        int containing the value of the unsigned byte.

      • checkOutOfBounds

        static void checkOutOfBounds​(PageCursor cursor)
        Calls PageCursor.checkAndClearBoundsFlag() and if true throws TreeInconsistencyException. Should be called whenever leaving a shouldRetry-loop successfully. Purpose of this method is to unify PageCursor read behavior and exception handling.
        Parameters:
        cursor - PageCursor to check for out-of-bounds.

      • goTo

        static void goTo​(PageCursor cursor,
                 String messageOnError,
                 long pageId)
          throws IOException
        Calls PageCursor.next(long) with the pageId and throws IllegalStateException if that call returns false. Purpose of this method is to unify exception handling when moving between pages.
        Parameters:
        cursor - PageCursor to call PageCursor.next(long) on.
        messageOnError - additional error message to include in exception if PageCursor.next(long) returned false, providing more context to the exception message.
        pageId - page id to move to.
        Throws:
        IOException - on PageCursor.next(long) exception.
